turns.speaker: client
turns.text: HEY MEG. CAN YOU PLACE AN ORDER AT STARBUCKS THAT I CAN PICK UP ON MY WAY TO MEET MY CLIENT AT THEIR OFFICE IN ABOUT 15 MINUTES?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: SURE. WHICH STARBUCKS LOCATION WOULD YOU LIKE TO PICK YOUR COFFEE UP AT?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: THE STARBUCKS LOCATION OFF OF DURANGO AND ELKHORN WILL DO.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE ME TO ORDER FOR YOU?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I WOULD LIKE A VENTI CARAMEL MACCHIATO MADE WITH NON-FAT MILK.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: WOULD YOU LIKE THAT HOT, ICED OR BLENDED?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ICED WILL DO.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: WHOULD YOU LIKE ANY WHIP CREAM ON THAT OR TO ADD IN FLAVOR OR EXTRA ESPRESSO SHOTS?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: NO THANK YOU TO ALL OF THOSE OPTIONS.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: WOULD YOU LIKE ME TO ORDER ANY FOOD ITEMS WITH YOUR ORDER?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ACTUALLY, CAN YOU ADD A CHOCOLATE SWIRL BRIOCHE TO MY ORDER?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: SURE THING. WOULD YOU LIKE THAT TO BE WARMED?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: SURE THAT WOULD BE GREAT.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: JUST TO CONFIRM, I HAVE A VENTI ICED CARAMEL MACCHIATO MADE WITH NON-FAT MILK, NO WHIP CREAM AND NO OTHER ADDITIVES, AND A WARM CHOCOLATE SWIRL BRIOCHE. IS THAT CORRECT?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: THAT IS RIGHT.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: PERFECT. I AM PLACING YOUR ORDER NOW.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: PERFECT. I AM GATHERING MY THINGS TO HEAD OUT THE DOOR.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: YOUR ORDER SHOULD BE READY IN 6-8 MINUTES. THEY ARE ALWAYS BUSY, SO MORE LIKE 8 MINUTES.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AWESOME. MY DRIVE THERE IS ABOUT 5 MINUTES. THANK YOU!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OKAY, I AM SENDING THE ORDER CONFIRMATION TO YOUR PHONE RIGHT NOW.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: PERFECT!
